title.rendered: Arthodox 30 Soft Gel Capsules Maintains Healthy Bones and Supports Joints

content.rendered:
• Arthodox Capsules are formulated with a potent blend of natural ingredients, specifically designed to reduce joint pain, inflammation, and soreness.
  • This herbal remedy supports joint mobility, flexibility, and overall comfort, helping you maintain an active lifestyle.Made with medicated A2 Cow Ghee in soft gel form, these capsules ensure easy consumption and optimal absorption.

Key Benefits:

  • Pain & Inflammation Management: Effectively reduces aches, pains, and inflammation in the joints.
    Joint Lubrication: Helps keep joints lubricated, improving mobility and flexibility.
    Supports Joint Strength: Restores joint strength and promotes better function.
    Improved Absorption: The inclusion of A2 Cow Ghee enhances the absorption of the herbal ingredients, ensuring maximum benefit.
Direction of use: Take 2 soft gel capsules in the morning or as recommended by the physician. It should ideally be taken on empty stomach before meals. For better    results it should be taken with with water or milk.
Ingredients: Nirgundee, Methi, Sunthee, Maharasnadil, Dashmooladi, Shallaki Chopchinee, Mukul extract, Shuddha Laksha, Asthishrunkhala, A2 Cow Ghee.
 Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

excerpt.rendered: Arthodox Capsules are formulated with a potent blend of natural ingredients, specifically designed to reduce joint pain, inflammation, and soreness.
